{"step_by_step_thinking": "Cabotegravir is a medication that is used in the treatment and prevention of HIV/AIDS. It is an integrase inhibitor which prevents the virus from multiplying in the body. Recent studies have shown that it is effective in preventing HIV when used as a pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP). Therefore, it can be concluded that Cabotegravir is effective for HIV prevention.", "answer_choice": "A"}
